sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with huo chuang 火瘡 , fire sores. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 29: 火爛瘡方，丹參細 切，以羊脂煎成膏，敷瘡上 , “Recipe for festering fire sores : a fine cut of dan shen is prepared with lamb fat to a paste to be applied to the sores”. Huo liao cheng chuang 火燎成瘡 , sores generated by burns from fire [1]

Pathological Condition identical with huo chuang 火瘡 , fire sores. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry xiao mai 小麥 quotes Zhi qi ji fang 治奇疾方 : 火燎成瘡：炒麵，入巵子仁末，和油傅之 , “For sores generated by burns from fire : mix parched flour with zhi zi ren powder, add oil, and apply externally”.
